page.title: 06LEISURE TIME SURVEY:2
page.content: painted, 7 percent collected postcards, and 8 percent collected badges. Obviously, some people had more than one hobby. Outside hobbies were also popular, with 28 percent keen sportsmen, 3 percent fishermen, 3 percent dancers, 7 percent keen on Keep-Fit, 16 percent rollerskaters, 28 percent swimmers, 2 percent showing animals, 2 percent train spotters, 3 percent ice-skaters, 2 percent kite flyers, 2 percent pigeon racers, 2 percent plane spotters, and a further two percent involved in radio-controlled model cars. When asked if they felt they used their leisure time properly, 62 percent said YES, 5 percent said NO, and 33 percent said DIDN'T KNOW. 30 people took part in the survey aged 12-13.
